page.title: 15Churches
page.content: The Rev. Philip McFadyen is the vicar of Swardeston Church. He is in charge of four parishes and five churches. These are Intwood, Keswick, Swardeston, East Carleton and Ketteringham. The main areas of a vicar's work in this area are raising money for the churches and trying to make people aware of Christ. A vicar is also responsible for training people to read services. He goes to Christian studies at the University, visits schools, and also goes to the Cathedral. His normal day's work consists of studying, prayers, services, visiting people in hospitals and meetings. He enjoys visiting old people and dislikes having to raise money.
